languages.text: "Ведьма, ты ходишь по тонкой грани между откровенной ересью и дулом болтера. Закрой рот, пока я сам{mf||а} этого не сделал{mf||а}".
"Witch, you are walking a fine line between outright heresy and the barrel of a bolter. Shut your mouth before I shut it for you."
languages.original_text: "Ведьма, ты ходишь по тонкой грани между откровенной ересью и дулом болтера. Закрой рот, пока я сам{mf||а} этого не сделал{mf||а}".

traits.locale_text: "Witch, you are walking a fine line between outright heresy and the barrel of a bolter. Shut your mouth before I shut it for you."
"Witch, you are walking a fine line between outright heresy and the barrel of a bolter. Shut your mouth before I shut it for you."
"Witch, you are walking a fine line between outright heresy and the barrel of a bolter. Shut your mouth before I shut it for you."
"Witch, you are walking a fine line between outright heresy and the barrel of a bolter. Shut your mouth before I shut it for you."

languages.text: “女巫，你的言论几乎算得上是彻彻底底的异端邪说，再说下去就要挨爆矢枪了。赶紧闭嘴，否则我替你把嘴闭上。”
languages.original_text: "Witch, you are walking a fine line between outright heresy and the barrel of a bolter. Shut your mouth before I shut it for you."

traits.locale_text: “女巫，你的言论几乎算得上是彻彻底底的异端邪说，再说下去就要挨爆矢枪了。赶紧闭嘴，否则我替你把嘴闭上。”

languages.text: « Prenez garde, sorcière. Vous flirtez dangereusement avec l'hérésie. Alors, fermez-la si vous ne voulez pas vous retrouver avec le canon d'un bolter sur la tempe. »
languages.original_text: "Witch, you are walking a fine line between outright heresy and the barrel of a bolter. Shut your mouth before I shut it for you."

traits.locale_text: « Prenez garde, sorcière. Vous flirtez dangereusement avec l'hérésie. Alors, fermez-la si vous ne voulez pas vous retrouver avec le canon d'un bolter sur la tempe. »

languages.text: «Bruja, recorres un camino muy estrecho entre la herejía abierta y el cañón de un bólter. Cierra la boca antes de que te la cierre».
languages.original_text: "Witch, you are walking a fine line between outright heresy and the barrel of a bolter. Shut your mouth before I shut it for you."

traits.locale_text: «Bruja, recorres un camino muy estrecho entre la herejía abierta y el cañón de un bólter. Cierra la boca antes de que te la cierre».

languages.text: 「魔女よ。君は異端とボルターの銃身との間の、微妙な一線を歩いている。口を閉じろ。さもなくば私が閉ざす」
languages.original_text: "Witch, you are walking a fine line between outright heresy and the barrel of a bolter. Shut your mouth before I shut it for you."

traits.locale_text: 「魔女よ、お前は異端とボルターの銃身の、スレスレの位置にいる。痛い目にあいたくなければ、今すぐ黙れ」
「魔女よ。君は異端とボルターの銃身との間の、微妙な一線を歩いている。口を閉じろ。さもなくば私が閉ざす」

languages.text: "Hexe, Ihr wandelt auf einem schmalen Grat zwischen dreister Ketzerei und dem Lauf eines Bolters. Haltet den Mund, ehe ich ihn für Euch schließe."
languages.original_text: "Witch, you are walking a fine line between outright heresy and the barrel of a bolter. Shut your mouth before I shut it for you."

traits.locale_text: "Hexe, Ihr wandelt auf einem schmalen Grat zwischen dreister Ketzerei und dem Lauf eines Bolters. Haltet den Mund, ehe ich ihn für Euch schließe."

languages.text: "Cadı, düpedüz kâfirlik ile namlunun ucu arasında gidip geliyorsun. Bizzat ben devreye girmeden çeneni kapa istersen."
languages.original_text: "Witch, you are walking a fine line between outright heresy and the barrel of a bolter. Shut your mouth before I shut it for you."

traits.locale_text: "Cadı, düpedüz kâfirlik ile namlunun ucu arasında gidip geliyorsun. Bizzat ben devreye girmeden çeneni kapa istersen."
